document.full_text: prosecutors unsealed an indictment on thursday charging an accused serial killer dubbed the "grim sleeper" with murdering 10 girls and women during a los angeles-area crime spree that spanned three decades.
document.title: l.a.'s "grim sleeper" suspect indicted on 10 murder counts
lines_and_colors: prosecutors unsealed an indictment on thursday charging an accused serial killer dubbed the "grim sleeper" with murdering 10 girls and women during a los angeles-area crime spree that spanned three decades.
